content.text:
# American Music Award for Favorite Country Male Artist__disambig_1

The American Music Award for Favorite Male Artist â€“ Country has been awarded since 1974. Years reflect the year in which the awards were presented, for works released in the previous year (until 2003 onward when awards were handed out on November of the same year). The all-time winner in this category is Garth Brooks with 8 wins.
